table_description: Contains information about organizational departments including budget, location, and department head assignments.
use_cases: List all departments and their locations
data_quality_notes: department_head_id references employees.employee_id - use JOIN to get head details
department_head_id can be NULL initially, updated after employees are inserted
budget is in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah) with DECIMAL(15,2) precision
Contains 6 departments: Engineering, Human Resources, Sales, Marketing, Finance, Operations

table_columns.name: department_id
table_columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each department.

table_columns.name: department_head_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to employees table. References the employee who heads this department. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: budget
table_columns.description: Annual budget allocated to the department in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah).

table_columns.name: created_date
table_columns.description: Date when the department was established. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.
